EmailTemplate.subject: SPECIAL OFFER from Gulf if you attended New England Grows!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Great news! If you recently attended New England Grows 2013, you could save a significant amount of money each time you fuel your company vehicle at Gulf!
With helpful expense controls, convenient reporting tools and savings of up to 5¢* off on every gallon of fuel purchased at Gulf, businesses can save significantly on the cost to fuel – and manage – company vehicles. Plus, as a participant in New England Grows 2013, you could save another 10¢ off per gallon for the first 3 months when you apply for a Gulf Fleet Card by March 31, 2013!**
To learn more and to apply, visit www.gulffleetcard.com/grows. Or call me at 781.467.9492.
All my best,
Bob Everts Gulf Fleet Program Regional Sales Manager Cell 781-467-9492 Fax 207-874-1576 www.gulffleetcard.com/grows
*Applicable to Commercial Fleet and Universal Fleet accounts only. Rebates are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
**Only for qualified New England Grows 2013 participants who apply for a Gulf Commercial Fleet Card or a Gulf Universal Fleet Card by March 31, 2013, and are approved. Savings will commence the day the account is opened, then revert to the standard rebate offer after the initial 3-month period. Rebate will appear as a credit on the monthly billing statement.
